title: Magazin Olten
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This lunch bar is located in the old fire station in Olten. They offer a salad buffet which has an array of fresh vegetables and is vegan friendly. Try the spinach & cheese or mushroom vegetarian crepes - ask for no cheese for vegans. You pay for the meal at the kitchen, you choose your place to sit (quiet and sunny place), and the meal will be served to your table. The salad buffet is very well equipped with fresh vegetables.
